column2: "I heard the sounds of photons in distress, and am here to save the day. It is I, Huey!"
"What? Really? That's not right, is it? Of course not!"
"It seems my sense is off lately. I wonder if it's because of the bad photons around here!"
"People often say that I'm revolting, but I don't think that's the case! I believe people think I'm weird!"
"Sometimes it almost makes me cry, but I won't let it get to me!"
"But I really don't understand, it seems like this entire area has the sense of sad photons..."
"Since it's being carried by photons, it must be someone's feelings...."
"I may not be able to save them, but I need to do something!"
"I'm going to continue searching for the cause. May we meet again!"
